title.rendered: E-commerce and Private Equity – with Chris Shipferling of Global Wired Advisors Part 1

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:21 — 26.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:21 — 26.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Chris Shipferling from Global Wired Advisors is a part of the ecosystem of people who help built wonderful businesses to sell and realize their value. He is a managing partner of GWA, which is a lower middle market investment bank focused on e-commerce businesses.

If you want further insight into the market and where it’s going, and how your biz fits into that,  reach out to us at www.globalwiredadvisors.com 

Email cs@globalwiredadvisors.com

You’ll Learn:

  • The difference between a business broker and an M&A Advisor
  • How they offer different products from a  business brokerage process
  • Why the process in GWA is different
  • To define the size of a business by their cashflow
